actions.text: Amendment SA 1224 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 1224 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 1217. (consideration: CR S9315-9316; text: CR S9316) To make available from amounts available for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Air Force, $4,000,000 for the cost effective composite materials for manned and unmanned flight structures.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1224 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 1217.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1224 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To make available from amounts available for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Air Force, $4,000,000 for the cost effective composite materials for manned and unmanned flight structures.
